channel.title: Thanh Tran on News
channel.description: Recent content in Thanh Tran on News

item.title: CMSâ€™s Proposed PI Rule Changes is a Good Start, But Does it Address Enough?
item.description: Federal healthcare organizations such as CMS have spent billions of dollars over the years trying to bridge the gap between medical data and quality patient care with interoperability requirements and data integration, the mesh used to try and bridge the gap. Many government rules have been written to address the type of mesh needed and many EHR companies have claimed to meet these government requirements and claim the throne of the ultimate mesh maker.
